title: Bug 21706: Issue with Class.forName() Usage in BidiUtil on Win32
description: This bug report pertains to a problem with 'Class.forName()' usage in BidiUtil on the Win32 platform.
OB: The bug report does not provide specific observed behavior.
EB: The expected behavior should be the resolution of the issue related to 'Class.forName()' usage. The bug report suggests a potential solution by changing the line of code to 'static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4);'. However, it is noted that this change has not been tested.
SR: To address the bug, you can attempt the proposed code change by modifying the line: 'static Callback callback = new Callback (BidiUtil.class, 'windowProc', 4);' to 'static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4);'. After making this change, further testing and verification should be carried out to confirm that the issue is resolved.
